scripts.android:sync: cross-env PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=https://tiny-tidy.api.depa-team.com bun run build:mobile && cross-env CAP_SERVER_URL=https://tiny-tidy.depa-team.com CAP_ALLOW_NAVIGATION=tiny-tidy.depa-team.com,tiny-tidy.api.depa-team.com cap sync android
scripts.android:build:debug: bun run android:sync && pwsh -NoProfile -Command "Set-Location android; ./gradlew.bat assembleDebug"
scripts.android:build:release: bun run android:sync && pwsh -NoProfile -Command "Set-Location android; ./gradlew.bat assembleRelease"
scripts.ios:sync: cross-env PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=https://tiny-tidy.api.depa-team.com bun run build:mobile && cross-env CAP_SERVER_URL=https://tiny-tidy.depa-team.com CAP_ALLOW_NAVIGATION=tiny-tidy.depa-team.com,tiny-tidy.api.depa-team.com cap sync ios
scripts.ios:open: bun run ios:sync && cap open ios
scripts.prod: bun run build && bun run preview
